snippet: Members of the activist collective known as Anonymous falsely named the police officer who shot an unarmed 18-year-old black man on Saturday. The botched identification triggered rancor in the network.
abstract: Members of Anonymous, shadowy international group of hackers, has played key role in growing confrontation over shooting of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Mo, goading and threatening authorities and calling effort Operation Ferguson; collective released name of officer they say was responsible for shooting and has run up against accusations that information is incorrect.
lead_paragraph: Members of the activist collective known as Anonymous falsely named the police officer who shot an unarmed 18-year-old black man on Saturday. The botched identification triggered rancor in the network.

headline.main: Anonymous Hackers’ Efforts to Identify Ferguson Police Officer Create Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Hackers’ Efforts to Identify Officer Create Turmoil
